points: PRINCE2 integrates via governance artifacts (Business Case, stage plans, exceptions).
PMBOK7 integrates through principles/domains with strong tailoring over prescriptive steps.
ISO21500 provides a harmonized conceptual model without a specific method.
PRINCE2 prescribes governance roles (Project Board, Executive, etc.) to drive engagement decisions.
PMBOK7 emphasizes systems thinking, servant leadership, and co-creation with stakeholders.
ISO21500 focuses on identifying needs/expectations with process-oriented communication guidance.
PRINCE2 uses product-based planning and Product Descriptions to define scope.
PMBOK7 centers on outcomes/value with scope emerging across domains and tailoring.
ISO21500 references WBS-based structuring and baseline alignment at a conceptual level.
PRINCE2 plans by stages with tolerances; escalation via management by exception.
PMBOK7 encourages adaptive cadences and pulling work to optimize flow.
ISO21500 frames activity sequencing/estimation/control in a standards-aligned baseline context.
PRINCE2 ties costs to Business Case and uses tolerances/exceptions to escalate.
PMBOK7 blends cost with value measurement and forecasting flexibility.
ISO21500 provides high-level cost control notions without tool prescription.
PRINCE2 uses Quality Register and formal product reviews.
PMBOK7 embeds quality in principles and continuous improvement.
ISO21500 remains conceptual with planning/control expectations.
PRINCE2 emphasizes role clarity and governance-driven resource decisions.
PMBOK7 focuses on team performance and leadership environment.
ISO21500 references acquire/develop/manage at a high level.
PRINCE2 defines reporting/communication artifacts tied to stages.
PMBOK7 promotes transparency, collaboration, and frequent feedback.
ISO21500 outlines planning and distribution of information conceptually.
PRINCE2 aligns suppliers via governance (Senior Supplier, commercial controls).
PMBOK7 discusses contract strategies and relationship management in domains.
ISO21500 describes procurement phases with neutral stance on method.
PRINCE2 defines a Risk theme with registers, roles, and management by exception.
PMBOK7 treats risk within principles/performance domains with strong tailoring and opportunity focus.
ISO21500 provides high-level process guidance aligned to governance without prescribing detailed method.
PRINCE2 has formal Issue/Change Control and tolerance-based exceptions.
PMBOK7 embeds change in governance/tailoring with iterative delivery.
ISO21500 provides conceptual change/configuration control guidance.
PRINCE2 defines Project Board and delivery roles explicitly.
PMBOK7 promotes adaptable governance, leadership styles, and empowerment.
ISO21500 standardizes terminology and governance concepts.
PRINCE2 enforces continued justification/benefits tracking at stage gates.
PMBOK7 frames value realization and measurement across domains.
ISO21500 aligns benefits with strategy in a high-level manner.
